name: Plunder Pit
description:
Shiver me timbers! Enjoy classic block puzzle game play with a twist in Plunder Pit! Fight ghostly ships of the dead by placing shapes to make and clear lines of blocks! Utilize blasting kegs of powerups to destroy blocks and fight your way to the final conflict with the Great Old One himself!

Plunder Pit is compatible with Goji Play and provides exclusive features for exercise when Goji Play has been enabled. For more information on Goji Play please visit www.bluegoji.com

Plunder Pit does not support Goji Moments or Goji Mall.
